title: "Brain Machine Interface Enables Mind-Controlled Wheelchairs"
excerpt: "A new study published in iScience, a Cell Press journal, reveals how the severely paralyzed can drive wheelchairs with thoughts in a realistic environment after non-invasively training an artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled brain-machine interface (BMI) algorithm."
